lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: Over the last thirty years or so, micro finance has proven to be the best tool we have at reducing extreme poverty. Extreme poverty and environmental degradation are the two biggest problems currently facing mankind.  While micro finance on its own may not eliminate poverty, it has, and will continue to go a long way towards mitigating the problem, and in turn help prevent some of the environmental degradation overpopulation is causing.

lenders.occupational_info:
I am a student in high school, and I felt like helping some people across the world. I know I have never met them, but I wish they could be in my shoes right now. All these third world countries are suffering because of the first world ones. Huge corporations take over much of the land in the third world countries, and they take alot and give back less. So I think it's partly my fault for living so well. Just thinking my well-livingis the cause of people in other countries to suffer, I cannot live on that fact. I wish I could help them in some way, but I'm only a student, with very little funds and power. The best I can do is help someone through Kiva for now, right?

This site is an awesome idea. I love how you get the money back from the entrepreneurs and you are able to loan again!

Thanks for an awesome experience Kiva.org!

lenders.name: Rena

lenders.name: Ole
lenders.loan_because: I think poverty is the most serious moral problem of our time, because I think it's imperative on all affluent to do what they can to alleviate it, and because I think microlending is one way to do so. Last, but not least, because I think anything which helps make more people politically aware of poverty is a great thing, and I think kiva is excellent for that.

lenders.name: HollyandDave
lenders.loan_because:
I love.
I want to help make a difference in many ways. I also run a small, craftsperson business with myself & my husband, Dave. We work VERY hard to keep things going.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have been able to finally get the education to take my jewelry design to the next level with silversmithing & metal art. I sell at arts & crafts show, flea markets & online. I have my store on Etsy.com http://www.tujaded.etsy.com

I was injured about 1 yr & one-half ago & it has been so hard to work, so I appreciate the common struggle.

lenders.name: mattt
lenders.loan_because: Micro lending is a very meaningful way give a direct benefit to those requiring a littleassistance to greatly improve their social and financial position.
lenders.occupational_info:
We mainly design and make a range of handmade bags for mostly the Australian market.
We use the best materials available and continually improve our products to use the most environmentally suitable materials.

lenders.name: Kelley & John
lenders.loan_because: I joined some ladies from my church and had a garage sale to raise the money to make this loan.  We got rid of surplus from our homes and sold it to be a blessing to women trying to support their families.

lenders.name: George Siler
lenders.loan_because: We believe microloans will lift people out of poverty permanently.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher at a Christian high school in Florida, USA, and we believe this is a way of helping our fellow man.
